reviewText: QUICK SHIP-ITEM AS DESCRIBED.
I bought extras to give out to some people in my life. This is very eye opening for these days ahead.
A must see documentary, it will explain what it's going on in our country. Excellent job and research.

Great Movies! I watched the first Agenda a couple of years ago and found it very informative. Agenda 2 was just as good. The movies shed light on why our society is shifting from a conservative to a liberal, socialist ideology. For anyone looking to have a greater understanding of socialism and communism -- and the threats waged against our nation -- these movies are truly educational.

An eye opening summery of the evil, deceptive practices of the left to turn us into a third world nation of surfs.  We are being systematically destroyed from within.  We see their tactics, political groups, their hidden leaders, AGENDAS, and how an ignorant electorate and godless generation bought it all.  Every patriotic citizen must see these excellent documentaries and educate yourself.  Then don't miss seeing the movie "Hillary's America."  It's the nail-in-the-coffin sequel.
It was very much an eye opener. Everyone needs to see it.

I just finished watching this awesom two DVD set.  I am heartbroken at what I already knew about the agenda to destroy America and how it is continuing to be implimented.  If you think this is all conspiracy, I challenge you to watch it for yourself.  Every Senator, Congressman, Mayor, Governor . City council member, or any elected official should watch these DVD's.  Write down the terms they talk about, the people, the organizations, and the dates.  Look up the information for yourself, you will find these DVD's are based on 100% fact!  As a Christian I am heartbroken because their main goal is to discredit God and His Son Jesus Christ.  Sad, but true they have accomplished this goal very well.  Most of our churches have a false Jesus and a false gospel.  And what is sadder than that, their congregations have fallen prey to their deceit and gone along with their social agenda.  Most church people in America do not know one Bible verse, they do not know which books are in the Old Testament or New, they have rarely read the Bible.  We had better get back to the Bible ( Basic Instruction Before Leaving  Earth)  prayer, and true worship or we are doomed as a civilization.  America was once free and God centered now we are losing our freedoms and traveling the world with Mother Earth.  God is still on His throne, He is still Soverign and His Authority is not questioned.  Where are you in the scheem  of things?  Are you standing with God or man?  When you watch these DVD's you will have to make that decision, your life and your eternal destiny will depend on it.  God Bless Curtis Bowers and his family for two great films!
I highly recommend watching both DVDs, really provides an understanding to the agenda that has been perpetrated by an elite group of people
Everyone should watch and know what is happening in our country.

AWESOME documentaries that clearly explain how America has been poisoned with Marxism.  Best of all, Curtis Bowers explains everything in a calm, clear manner, so unlike the other howling egotists who present the same message but destroy it with their loud voices, louder music and confusing facts that focus more on the egotist presenting the facts than the facts themselves.  Bowers is the opposite of that, keeping himself in the background as he quietly explains how communism has polluted our media and government and, worst of all, our schools.  Communists understand that the easiest way to control adults is to first brainwash the children who will then grow up to be adults totally at the mercy of communism.  This is why communists have taken over the public school system in America, ensuring that only communist-friendly teachers and texts are allowed - and God is not.  This dvd series is so good I immediately gifted it to my priest.  I strongly urge all of you to do the same; i.e., give it to everyone you can.  The message in 'Agenda' MUST be shown to every American.  This documentary shines a light on the terrible darkness that has fallen over our nation; with the help of this light we can and will erase this evil ideology from our country.

This will open your eyes to what is going on around you.  Very well documented and presented in an interesting way.  Sometimes these kind of films can be boring but this is very well done.  I am planning on buying more for friends.
Well documentary - a few facts over looked - But stayed on task.
Fact filled. Very revealing.AGENDA 1/AGENDA 2 TWIN-PACK!

For those interested in the development of the Progressive Movement
in the United States and those interested in the dangers this movement
poses to our freedoms by infecting so much of our society,
the Agenda series clearly outlines the evils taking place within our society.
If individuals don't become informed, within a short time we'll be living
in a socialist society void of morality and freedom.
Very timely!  Excellent, thorough research and production!  Highly recommend all watch  both videos!

Wow, what a shocker. I did not realize how close we got in 2016. I was born in a communist country, so the 'Agenda' film really reminded me of my youth when I was being programmed by the socialist state, before we escaped to USA. Freedom is not free, one must constantly defend and fight for it or it will be lost.
Scarey stuff
These videos, are the complete package of information , on the Communist Party in America, and their plans to Destroy America.

Actually a good primer.  This is a good overview of the growth of the American Communist Party in the U.S.  This DVD and others that are similar would need to be several hours long to cover all aspects of the Fabian Socialist movement and the many U.S. citizens who have advanced its agenda. This should whet ones interest in knowing more, and hopefully, join the fight to oppose the Socialist agenda, which is demonstrably evil and deceitful.

Highly educational. One of my treasured documentaries along with The Enemies Within. Every American should see this to understand the history of the Communist Party from the 1950's to the present day OBAMA administration and their agenda to destroy America!!!!
I got one set for me and a second to share.
Very informative documentary about history of the liberal left.
If you're American, YOU NEED TO WATCH THIS... Your eyes will be opened!
Americas in DEEP, DEEP, DEEP trouble...!Great movie...!
Everyone should see Agenda!  Extremely eye opening!!
Don't be a "useful idiot"!  Get these dvd's and share them!

These movies are sure to give anyone a 2nd thought on where we are in America and where we are headed very fast and to see how long this has been in the works is so scary. This is a must have set and one to show with others  have a couple nights to watch with friends or a day with food and fellowship. Have it at your church as a study or video series to get in depth and talk about. How can we stand up for what is right and fair and keep our freedoms and not be martyred and tortured because we want morals and our country brought back to our founding Fathers great country we once were.

What an important piece of work this is.  A must watch for anyone wanting to understand how our society has got itself to this place of horror and decay that is 'modern life'.  Curtis Bowyer carefully explains, with the help of multiple quotes and supporting evidence, how the thinking of the Western world has been corrupted from within and what we must do to counter this destructive ideology and its attacks.  Very powerful, Agenda and Agenda 2 have certainly opened my eyes and I am very grateful for them.
A must watch for everyone who loves God and Country
Very informative. Should be viewed by many!

Excellent!

THIS guy tells it like it is.  I saw these two back to back on Amazon Fire Stick the other night.  I am buying these dvd's to take over to my best friend's house because his wife is brainwashed thinking and we got into it the other night at New Years about Trump and Hillary and Obama.  I will sit there and hold her hand and watch both of these.  If she still clings to the left ...she is also BRAIN DEAD and I cannot help her any more.  Good work to all that produced these two documentaries  and God bless you and yours.
